Job search in Japan Chapter 1 Summary

Job search in Japan Keisuke Kawata 2021-05-17 Chapter 1 Summary This page descrives the Japanese job-search market based on the Referentials and Placements by Prefecture, Employment Referral Statistics which reports monthly numbers of vacancy, job seekers, and new employment. We report not only simple time series of vacancy, job seeker, and new employment but also the labor market mismatch (Åžahin et al. 2014) and the welfare impact (Kawata and Sato 2021). Important note that Shibata (2020) estiamtes the mismatch index in Japanese labor market (from 2000 - 2019).
